name: 星礼研究所 | Sighchology Research Lab
name_original: 星礼研究所 | Sighchology Research Lab
description:
NOW, ENGLISH SUPPORTED!!!

In this game, you play as a student in the Sighchology Research Lab. In this dark place, you do research every night and day without sleep, because you have been given a great mission: to publish a piece of paper...

Everyone should spend about 1 hour playing this game.

For psychology enthusiasts, playing this game allows you to deeply understand and master the entire production process of psychology papers, which gives you a chance to dream like a science researcher.

For psychology students, playing this game can take you back to school.

For psychology teachers, playing this game can enhance your understanding of your students.

For the general public, playing this game is an opportunity to broaden your horizons, learn about yourself, improve yourself, and lead a better life.
